Note.Name: c:/Hoffman/My Builds/DashboardScripts/vogon_paraview_nmake71.cmake
Note.Text:
# please see common.cmake for more documentation ################################################################### # The values in this section must always be provided ################################################################### # these are the the name of the source and binary directory on disk. # They will be appended to DASHBOARD_ROOT SET (CTEST_SOURCE_NAME ParaView) SET (CTEST_BINARY_NAME ParaViewVSNMake71)
# do an update each time SET (CTEST_CVS_COMMAND "C:/cygwin/bin/cvs.exe") SET (CTEST_EXTRA_UPDATES_1 "C:/Hoffman/BuildNoSpace/ParaView" "-dAP")
# change this back to all tests after paraview is fixed # which ctest command to use for running the dashboard SET (CTEST_COMMAND "C:/Hoffman/My Builds/CMakeVSNMake71/bin/ctest.exe -D Experimental -A \"${CTEST_SCRIPT_DIRECTORY}/${CTEST_SCRIPT_NAME}\" -V" )
# what cmake command to use for configuring this dashboard SET (CTEST_CMAKE_COMMAND "C:/Hoffman/My Builds/CMakeVSNMake71/bin/cmake.exe" )
#################################################################### # The values in this section are optional you can either # have them or leave them commented out ####################################################################
# should ctest wipe the binary tree before running SET (CTEST_START_WITH_EMPTY_BINARY_DIRECTORY FALSE)
# this is the initial cache to use for the binary tree, be careful to escape # any quotes inside of this string if you use it SET (CTEST_INITIAL_CACHE " MAKECOMMAND:STRING=nmake -i DART_TESTING_TIMEOUT:STRING=120 CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM:FILEPATH=nmake CMAKE_GENERATOR:INTERNAL=NMake Makefiles BUILDNAME:STRING=Win32-nmake71 SITE:STRING=VOGON.kitware VTK_USE_MPI:BOOL=ON MPI_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=C:/Program Files/MPICH/SDK/Lib/mpichd.lib VTK_DEBUG_LEAKS:BOOL=ON CVSCOMMAND:FILEPATH=C:/cygwin/bin/cvs.exe BUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL=ON CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS:STRING= /W4 /Zm1000 /GX /GR CMAKE_C_FLAGS:STRING= /W4 /Zm1000 ")
# if you do not want to use the default location for a # dashboard then set this variable to the directory # the dashboard should be in SET (CTEST_DASHBOARD_ROOT "C:/Hoffman/BuildNoSpace/")
# set any extra envionment varibles here SET (CTEST_ENVIRONMENT )
################################################################### # finally include the common code ################################################################### INCLUDE ( ${CTEST_SCRIPT_DIRECTORY}/common.cmake )
